articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Polish President 
    Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Polish President Aleksander Kwasniewski on the occasion of the national holiday of
the Polish people.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to expand and develop on good terms in the bilateral interests, the message sincerely wished the president greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country and the well-being of its people.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Greets His Polish Counterpart
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Congratulates Egyptian President
    Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Hosni Mubarak, chairman of the National Democratic Party of Egypt and president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, on the occasion of the latter's 77th birthday.
 The message sincerely wished the Egyptian president good health and happiness and greater success in his work for the country's progress and prosperity and the Arab unity and the Mideast peace.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Greets His Polish Counterpart
    Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Polish counterpart Adam Daniel Rotpeld on the
occasion of the national day of the Polish people.
 The message expressed the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests.
